attributes.action: Go to war with the United States of America to liberate their people from an 'opressive regime'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United States patrols the world with us as its deputy, hypocritically demanding things of other nations and invading countries without lawful reason. President Bush is (allegedly) the unlawful president of the United States due to the Florida voting scandal in 2000, and therefore we must invade the 'Land of the free'. 

And show them they don't have everyone's support!

Create a coalition of the willing (Canada'll be up for it) and liberate the poor folks living under the oppression of such bills as the USA PATRIOT and PATRIOT II act.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
